lead_paragraph: The United States embassy in Beijing was denied access to the appeal hearing of an American geologist sentenced in July for buying a database on China’s oil industry.
snippet: The United States embassy in Beijing was denied access to the appeal hearing of an American geologist sentenced in July for buying a database on China’s oil industry.

headline.main: China Bars U.S. From American Geologist’s Appeal
headline.seo: U.S. Barred From Hearing of Xue Feng in Beijing
headline.print_headline: WORLD BRIEFING | ASIA; China: U.S. Embassy Blocked From Geologist’s Hearing
